Text: TXU at Lonestar KatyI spoke with Ronnie Skerrik and Charlie Stone this morning and they agreed that if Lonestar does not bring the gas back to HPL as nomed that the gas will continue to be sold to TXU This should elevate any higher vol redeliveriesMake up to HPL Please call me with any questions Janet

Cc the sale at Lockhart to Southern Union for two extra days at the same price Thank you Janet Forwarded by Janet H WallisHOUECT on AM Jackie Young AM To Janet H CT cc Subject Can you please extend deal to cover flow for and On the th decatherms flowed On the st decatherms flowed Thanks Jackie

Weekend Gas Cc to review weekend sales to Southern Union LONGTERM FIRM SALES FOR NOVEMBER Inside FERC K Gas Daily K thth Gas Daily K th Until nomed down this does not reflect prior Gas Daily sales SPOT Gas Daily HSC on Tuesdays printth K th th Firm deals above are first through the meter Call me if something doesnt look right Janet

Re HLP for Cc the pipelines decision on how to allocate between the shippers however If the pipeline allocates the shortage to ENA then we need to follow the contract language and bill accordingly Just remember that we allowed makeup on the th for a total volume of K over days so that will apply toward the th and part of the th All other volumes should be purchased back per the language in the contract Remember they have a tolerance of below the nomination Thanks Janet Kimberly Vaughn PM To Janet H CT Daren J CT cc Anita CT Howard B CT Pat NRON Subject HLP for HLP was short on the following days December th th th th th th th th How do you want to handle this Forwarded by Kimberly VaughnHOUECT on PM Anita Luong AM To Kimberly CT cc Howard B CT Subject HLP for For days and we are short at the aggregate meter Should the Reliant transport and Sales or do we charge Reliant a penalty Also I notice that at meter we have rd party transport this month This look strange because Ive not seen them here before Please advice Thanks

Panther Pipeline LTDLegalDHYVLDJHLtrcrfmdoc I just did a deal with Panther and I would use the same contract with this additional language Period of Delivery April March add that either party can terminate with days written notice add evergreen language so the deal will roll after the one year term Thanks J Is the commodity price at Katy tail gate or HSC It looks like the contract says both

Panther Pipeline LTDmake the new one HSC I think that is what I intended Forwarded by Janet H WallisHOUECT on PM Janet H Wallis AM To Dan J CT cc Subject Panther Pipeline LTD Re LegalDHYVLDJHLtrcrfmdoc I just did a deal with Panther and I would use the same contract with this additional language Period of Delivery April March add that either party can terminate with days written notice add evergreen language so the deal will roll after the one year term Thanks J Is the commodity price at Katy tail gate or HSC It looks like the contract says both

FW Austin Energy Contract Draftfor reminding me Original Message From Hadley Donna ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESHadleyCDonnaCDonnaEHadleyaustinenergy EcomE NRONcom Sent Monday April PM To Wallis Janet H Subject RE Austin Energy Contract Draft Janet here is the latest draft with all the changes previously agreed to incorporated The green hilited portions are additions as a result of Enrons last language addition I will be in a meeting until pm I will give you a call at approximatedly to see if we can finalize today Thanks enrondoc

New entex deal Cc admend the contract for a day at this deal ends I have blended and extended this deal and the new price is beginning through the new term of This sale is at Temple Inland Thanks PS Ed and Lauri even though this was only a month deal I was able to get

ENTEX Pricing Cc we have some new pricing I didnt want Kyle to get bored These deals will modify the Residential Contract ONE Term July June years Vol Price Convert HSC to plus the adder TWO Term Nov March Nov March Nov March Vol Price Convert HSC to plus the THREE Term Nov March Vol Price Convert HSC to plus the These are fixed price first through the meter

Re ENTEX Pricingdeal Term June May Vol Price Convert HSC to plust the adder Janet H Wallis PM To Dan J CT cc Ami NRON Kyle R CT Subject ENTEX Pricing Okay finally we have some new pricing I didnt want Kyle to get bored These deals will modify the Residential Contract ONE Term July June years Vol Price Convert HSC to plus the adder TWO Term Nov March Nov March Nov March Vol Price Convert HSC to plus the THREE Term Nov March Vol Price Convert HSC to plus the These are fixed price first through the meter

New pricing for HLP at San Jac due to Swaps Cc o Please prepare amendment This new pricing overrides all the amendments you have worked on in the last month ONeal please change pricing in system This pricing overrides the pricing I gave you a month ago Paul please review San Jac contract and new pricing spreadsheet and we will meet when you are ready Thanks everyone New Pricing begins in August See worksheet Pricing HLP Also sheet has actual swaps with swap values

Enfolio Contract with CPSlet me know if these changes are okay with you Thanks Janet Forwarded by Janet H WallisHOUECT on PM From James I Ducote PM To cc Subject Enfolio Contract with CPS Forwarded by James I DucoteHOUECT on PM Pfister Christian W on PM To cc Mc Whirter Daniel D Subject Enfolio Contract with CPS Sorry that you did not receive my email of Sept th with the attached addendum We have reviewed the draft of the Enfolio Master Firm PurchaseSales Agreement and find it generally to be a good agreement The attached file contains an addendum with three changes that we would like to make to the contract The first item is merely a grammatical clarification The second relates to the fact that we typically do not get the annual report out within days This year we got it out in about days The third item relates to a requirement that we must follow as a municipal corporation Although the purchase process has not yet been approved by executive management we wanted to get the contractual issues resolved so that the agreement could be immediately put in place once the approval occurs Please do not hesitate to contact me at if you have an questions about the addendum Enfolio Addendumdoc Thank you Christian W Pfister Contract Administration CPS Enfolio Addendumdoc

Entexexecute final document for the limited agency agreement and I will walk it over to Bruce next week Also I need a contract for the following transaction ECT selling to Entex Gas Marketing Company Nov March Katy tail gate both packages d firm at HSC minus Nov March d firm at the greater of HSC minus or with ECTs right but not the obligation to recall not sell this package if the first of the month IF HSC is or greater Call me with any questions J

Entex Cc final document for the limited agency agreement and I will walk it over to Bruce next week Also I need a contract for the following transaction ECT selling to Entex Gas Marketing Company Nov March Katy tail gate both packages d firm at HSC minus Nov March d firm at the greater of HSC minus or with ECTs right but not the obligation to recall not sell this package if the first of the month IF HSC is or greater Call me with any questions Oh yes since we will not know what IF HSC is until after the beginning of the month we have agreed to notify Entex of our intentions one day after NYMEX close by Noon Thanks and may the force be with you

Re Osborn Purchase Cc Hyvl will call Gary Lamphier with the meter number This should go in the system as soon as we get the meter number form Dan Hyvl We can put this deal in the system before the contracts are signed but we do not want to send the Osborn until we have a signed agreement from ENTEX Also do not pay Osborn until we recieve an allocation statement Thanks J Enron North America Corp From Megan Parker ENRON AM To Janet H CT cc Subject Osborn Purchase I wanted to let you know that we still do not have a deal in the system for Osborn Gary told Julie that the contract went back to legal and that he was waiting to hear from them before he did anything You can read Julies email below Can you help with the particulars of the deal especially the point Gary is not sure The only detail I got from Osborn was that the price should be HSC I would like to try and get their check out on Monday if we can get the deal in today Megan Forwarded by Megan ParkerCorpEnron on AM Julie CT AM To Megan NRON cc Subject Re Something new for EntexYeah Do you know the point Gary was waiting for Janet to ok it because she sent the contract back to legal because she didnt like some wording But Gary said that he would put a ticket in for September but he doesnt have the particulars Julie

Aug only deal with Entex GAs Mark Cc contract ECT is selling K a day at HSC minus at Katy Tailgate all month AUG and ECT has the option to sell an additional K a day option is daliy at Katy tailgate at HSC minus Thanks JW

Entex Cc one admendment and one new contract Admend RC to reflect this April October Mmbtus a day Price Higher of Inside FERC HSC minus or minus New deal April October Mmbtus a day IF HSC minus Delivery Location Clark refinery Baseload rateable Entex Gas Resources

Entex Gas Marketing Cc Is Entex Gas Marketing correct Ducote said to refer to the GISBY contracts for the proper name which you may have done Forwarded by Janet H WallisHOUECT on PM Kyle R Lilly AM To Janet H CT cc Eric CT Subject Entex Gas Marketing Janet Can you let me know what you find out regarding that million dollar pmt to Entex for extending the deal The Transaction Agreement the buysell nets out to the million due Entex Since this payment is for extending the deal shouldnt the Transaction Agreement be between ECT Reliant Energy Entex and not Entex Gas Marketing I will be out this afternoon so could you just email me Thanks Kyle

Re Entex Gas Marketing Cc Bruce Coogler Entex GAs Marketing is correct Kyle R Lilly AM To Janet H CT cc Eric CT Subject Entex Gas Marketing Janet Can you let me know what you find out regarding that million dollar pmt to Entex for extending the deal The Transaction Agreement the buysell nets out to the million due Entex Since this payment is for extending the deal shouldnt the Transaction Agreement be between ECT Reliant Energy Entex and not Entex Gas Marketing I will be out this afternoon so could you just email me Thanks Kyle

Entex contracts a day April October ENA sells phys gas Pricing Higher of HSC minus or minus deal ticket completed on Entex Gas Resources April October a day HSC at Clark Refinery meter ENA sells phys gas Pricing HSC deal ticket completed on Entex Gas Resources Nov a day Katy tailgate ENA buys phys gas Pricing HSC plus deal ticket completed Paying Swap value of Entex Gas Re Dec a day Katy tailgate ENA buys phys gas Pricing HSC plus deal ticket modified on Paying Swap value of and a put value of deal done on Entex Gas Resources April October each month Katy tailgate ENA sells phy gas Pricing Higher of or IF HSC deal ticket completed Entex Gas Resources Nov a day HSC Clark meter ENA sells phy gas Pricing Higher of HSC or Gas Daily HSC midpoint deal ticket completed Put May have the following one Entex Gas Res Oct a day Katy tailgate ENA buys phys gas Pricing IF HSC plus deal ticket completed Paying Swap value of

Austin Energy Gas Supply Agreementattached contract below Ignore and those will have to be changed Also keep an eye out in the default language for confirmations the Force Majeure language rd party beneficiary and transportion is not subject to force Majeure Thanks J Forwarded by Janet H WallisHOUECT on AM Sweeney Pat on AM To Janet Wallis Enron cc Hadley Donna Subject Austin Energy Gas Supply Agreement Contract Template doc Janet Attached is our standard gas enabling agreement that we plan to use with Enron It is the same agreement we put in place last year when Enron did not submit a bid If you will provide proper corporate address information for Enron we will generate an original contract Please let me know if you have any questions Pat Sweeney Austin Energy Contract Template doc

Re Enfolio Contract with CPSthis is fine with me Janet Dan J Hyvl AM To Pfister Christian W ENRON cc Janet H CT James I CT Subject Enfolio Contract with CPS Christian The below documents has been modified in the manner that you suggested Please make sure that the Purchase Order Number is communicated to all parties in writing prior to the end of the month if it is to be used The red line should reflect the changes that you have been requesting By copy I am requesting Janet Wallis to review the suggested changes and to communicate directly with you if she approves such changes If she notifies you that the changes are okay then you may print originals of the clean document and have it signed by CPS and forward to Janet for signature by ENA Do not hesitate to call if you have any questions My phone number is
entexsells physical gas a day Feb HSC Clark meter deal date

Re City of San Antonioistead of assigning the contract I would prefer to set up another contract under HPLC and assign that one What do you think Also I need to amend the Southern union contract at Austin Colorado River Sation to refect a swap from index to fixed price Feb a day instead of Index Dan J Hyvl AM To Jeffrey T CT Barbara N CT cc Janet H CT Subject City of San Antonio After months of email negotiations the Enfolio Master Firm PurchaseSale Agreement between Enron North America Corp and The City of San Antonio action through the City Public Service Board has been signed Just in time to assign to the new entity being set up for the non HPL Texas deals that need to remain separate from HPL
